tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Room (
    room_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_id INT REFERENCES Hotel(hotel_id),
    room_type VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Booking (
    booking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    room_id INT REFERENCES Room(room_id),
    guest_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE,
    total_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
CREATE TABLE hotels (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, rating FLOAT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE guests (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE hotels (hotel_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), rating FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE rooms (room_id INT PRIMARY KEY, hotel_id INT, type VARCHAR(50), price FLOAT, capacity INT);
CREATE TABLE bookings (booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_id INT, check_in_date DATE, check_out_date DATE, customer_name VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE hotels (hotel_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE rooms (room_id INT PRIMARY KEY, hotel_id INT, room_number INT, capacity INT);
CREATE TABLE bookings (booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_id INT, guest_name VARCHAR(255), check_in_date DATE, check_out_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE amenities (amenity_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Hotel (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)},{
CREATE TABLE Room (id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_number INT NOT NULL, hotel_id INT NOT NULL, description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE Guest (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Reservation (id INT PRIMARY KEY, guest_id INT NOT NULL, room_id INT NOT NULL, start_date DATE, end_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE Review (id INT PRIMARY KEY, guest_id INT NOT NULL, hotel_id INT NOT NULL, rating INT NOT NULL, comment TEXT)
